head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BUSCH, LOTTE ISING

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BUSCH, LOTTE ISING

block.p: BUSCH-Lotte Ising. The Musicians, Trustees, and Staff of the Marlboro Music School and Festival extend sincere sympathy and affection to the family of Lotte Busch. From Marlboro's first season 50 years ago, as wife of cofounder cellist Herman Busch, Lotte's warmth and enthusiasm for life radiated throughout our community and inspired us all. The Marlboro Family
